title: Visual and Spatial Gradient Lab Inaugurated
summary: The Visual and Spatial Gradient Lab, part of the PVFA at Texas A&M University (TAMU) and led by Professor Suryansh Kumar, has been inaugurated. The lab specializes in advancing research in 3D Vision, Robotics, and Machine Learning.

title: AI Seed Grant.
summary: Received AI Seed Grant for Research and Creative Works from the College of PVFA. This work will be conducted in collaboration with Jeff Morris and Corte Guiherme
